Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could greatly enhance your productivity and efficiency. Given its high quality and unique features, I estimate its value to be significantly more than $150. To make it accessible for you, I am offering it at a special introductory price of $180. This is an exclusive opportunity to own a product that has been highly sought after by many, and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations. Please let me know if you're interested in this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $180. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $180
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
